com.travelbank.knit

Class KnitAppListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.travelbank.knit.KnitAppListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.app.Application.ActivityLifecycleCallbacks

    public class KnitAppListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.app.Application.ActivityLifecycleCallbacks
    This is used internally by Knit to listen for activity lifecycle events and handle them accordingly.

      • onActivityCreated

        public void onActivityCreated(android.app.Activity activity,
                              android.os.Bundle bundle)
        Called when an Activity is created. This method attaches Fragment life cycle listeners to the activity and initializes dependencies for it.
        Specified by:
        onActivityCreated in interface android.app.Application.ActivityLifecycleCallbacks
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity that has been created
        bundle - Saved instance state of the Activity being created

      • onActivityStarted

        public void onActivityStarted(android.app.Activity activity)
        Called when an Activity is started. It finds the presenter(InternalPresenter) for the given activity and calls the presenters onViewStart method.
        Specified by:
        onActivityStarted in interface android.app.Application.ActivityLifecycleCallbacks
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity that has started

      • onActivityResumed

        public void onActivityResumed(android.app.Activity activity)
        Called when an Activity is resumed. It finds the presenter(InternalPresenter) for the given activity and calls the presenters onViewResume method.
        Specified by:
        onActivityResumed in interface android.app.Application.ActivityLifecycleCallbacks
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity that has resumed

      • onActivityDestroyed

        public void onActivityDestroyed(android.app.Activity activity)
        Called when an Activity has been destroyed. It tells knit to destroy the components used by the activity.
        Specified by:
